thread.title: Natchez house on most endangered historic places list
thread.title_full: Natchez house on most endangered historic places list - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Natchez house on most endangered historic places list
text:
NATCHEZ, Miss. (AP) - One historic house in Natchez may be on the brink of extinction.
The Natchez Democrat reports ( http://bit.ly/1Ko25sY ) Melmont, a two-story Greek revival house has been named this week to the 10 Most Endangered Historic Places in Mississippi list by the Mississippi Heritage Trust - a nonprofit organization that supports historic preservation efforts throughout the state.
Lolly Barnes, MHT executive director, said the trust takes nominations for the list annually.
This year, the Historic Natchez Foundation (HNF) nominated Melmont.
Mimi Miller, director of the Historic Natchez Foundation, says Melmont has severe structure problems.
The Wilkinson County Jail, built in 1929 and located in Woodville, also made the list of endangered historic places.
Information from: The Natchez Democrat, http://www.natchezdemocrat.com/
